Bitcoin Cash supporters are stuck in the past. They want the variant of Bitcoin as it was designed in the original white paper. Bitcoin supporters want the future (Lightning/Segwit/etc). Let people have whatever variant they want - but please let’s stop the vitriol on both sides!
Bitcoin is Bitcoin, not Bitcoin Core or BCore. Core is the implementation client with the highest adoption within Bitcoin. Bitcoin Cash is not Bitcoin. But it equally is not BCash or BTrash.
